Topic Summary: Appeal against an assessment to Income Tax regarding the transfer of shareholding by a proprietary director.
Tax Legislation: Section 2 Taxes Consolidation Act, 1997 ("TCA 1997"); section 472 TCA 1997; section 825A Reduction in income tax for certain income earned outside the State; Section 959P Expression of doubt; Section 959AU TCA 1997: Date for payment of tax - amended assessments.
